name: MaterialHardshipDiagnosesICD10CM
title: Material Hardship Diagnoses ICD10CM
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with material hardship as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD-10-CM diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Basic services unavailable in physical environment
Material hardship due to limited financial resources, not elsewhere classified
Encounter for counseling for socioeconomic factors
Patient's intentional underdosing of medication regimen due to financial hardship
Patient's noncompliance with other medical treatment and regimen due to financial hardship
Caregiver's intentional underdosing of patient's medication regimen due to financial hardship

contains.display: Basic services unavailable in physical environment
